Procs

proc `[]`(headers: HttpHeaders; key: string): string {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the first header value the key. Not case sensitive. Source   Edit   
proc `[]=`(headers: var HttpHeaders; key, value: string) {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Adds a new header if the key is not already present. If the key is already present this overrides the first header value for the key. Not case sensitive. Source   Edit   
proc contains(headers: HttpHeaders; key: string): bool {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Checks if there is at least one header for the key. Not case sensitive. Source   Edit   
proc emptyHttpHeaders(): HttpHeaders {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
